snippet.title: Psychosis: Teaser (Launch Trailer) | Retro Survival-Horror
snippet.description:
Teaser out now for PC on Itch! https://aarongamemaker.itch.io/psychosis-teaser

Psychosis is a psychological survival-horror game about familicide. Fight against demons and your own mind to save yourself from a neverending hell in this retro-style survival-horror game.

Pick up the mysterious pieces of a family gone missing and fight your way to the truth. 

Trust nothing as you lose your mind finding yourself transported to unfamiliar places. 

Transport yourself back to the 1990s Pacific Northwest with a hybrid-retro art style reminiscent of the era. The game is presented in a derezzed art style with modern lighting and crunchy audio. 

______________

Psychosis is currently developed by a team of two: a developer and a composer.

Download the teaser - https://aarongamemaker.itch.io/psychosis-teaser
Stay notified of the full game - https://psychosisgame.com/
Follow the development - https://twitter.com/PlayPsychosis
Join the Discord - https://discord.gg/RVuPGJdke8
Watch dev streams - https://twitch.tv/marth8880
Indie DB - https://www.indiedb.com/games/enterpsychosis
